title: Detritivore
text: Detritivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of nonbasic land cards in your opponents' graveyards.Suspend X—. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay  and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)Whenever a time counter is removed from Detritivore while it's exiled, destroy target nonbasic land.
